definition: intended to attract notice and impress others
details:
adjective
- intended to attract notice and impress others
= synonyms: ostentatious
- making claim to or creating an appearance of (often undeserved) importance or distinction
= example: making claim to or creating an appearance of (often undeserved) importance or distinction
- (of a display) tawdry or vulgar
= synonyms: ostentatious
